content: Is it true that Mount Everest is the tallest mountain on Earth?

Yes, Mount Everest is indeed the tallest mountain on Earth. It stands at an impressive height of 8,848 meters (29,029 feet) above sea level and is located in the Mahalangur mountain range in the Himalayas. The mountain lies on the border between Nepal and China (Tibet Autonomous Region). It is a popular destination for mountaineers and attracts many climbers each year who attempt to reach its summit.
